body_html: I am sorry, I forgot that I did reshape the input by using view(-1,3,224,224), so the input size should be (8*3,3,224,224). I used 3 frames from each video in ucf101 as training sample just like Temporal Segment Network like this https://github.com/yjxiong/tsn-pytorch. I used four 1080Ti gpus to train this model.

body: I am sorry, I forgot that I did reshape the input by using view(-1,3,224,224), so the input size should be (8*3,3,224,224). I used 3 frames from each video in ucf101 as training sample just like Temporal Segment Network like this https://github.com/yjxiong/tsn-pytorch. I used four 1080Ti gpus to train this model.
